Helping Build a Better Internet

Trusted by over 10 million domains, Cloudflare is one of the world’s largest cloud network platforms. Give your global users a faster, more secure, and more reliable internet experience.

UNDER ATTACK?

A Growing Global Network Built for Scale

20 Tbps Capacity and 154 Data Center Global Footprint

Making the Internet Work the Way It Should for Anything Online

Cloudflare speeds up and protects millions of websites, APIs, SaaS services, and other properties connected to the Internet. Our Anycast technology enables our benefits to scale with every server we add to our growing footprint of data centers.

Performance

Cloudflare dramatically improves website performance through our global CDN and web optimization features. Learn more

Security

Cloudflare’s WAF, DDoS protection, and SSL defend website owners and their visitors from all types of online threats. Learn more

Reliability

With over 35% market share, Cloudflare runs the largest, fastest, and most reliable managed DNS service in the world. Learn more

Insight

Cloudflare’s network helps identify visitor and bot behavior that isn’t accessible to conventional analytics technologies. Learn more

Setting Up Cloudflare Is Easy

Set up a domain in less than 5 minutes. Keep your hosting provider. No code changes required.

Cloudflare makes more than 10,000,000 properties faster and safer. Join today!
